content: knitted vest in drops sky the piece is worked in stocking stitch with ribbed edges v-neck and split in the sides sizes s - xxxl drops design pattern no skip-136 yarn group b **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops sky from garnstudio 150-200-200-200-250-250 g colour 15 aquamarine **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 60 or 80 cm for rib
